title: Const generic overflow while adding drop-check rules
body:
The following code doesnt compile  and fails with a weird error:
```Rust
#![feature(const_generics)]

struct Node<const SIZE: usize> {
    nxt: Option<Box<Node<{SIZE * 2}>>>,
    data: [u8; SIZE]
}

impl <const SIZE: usize> Node<{SIZE}> {
    pub fn new() -> Self {
        Self {
            nxt: None,
            data: [0; SIZE]
        }
    }
}
```

It errors with:
```
warning: the feature `const_generics` is incomplete and may cause the compiler to crash
 --> src/lib.rs:1:12
  |
1 | #![feature(const_generics)]
  |            ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  |
  = note: `#[warn(incomplete_features)]` on by default

error[E0320]: overflow while adding drop-check rules for Node<SIZE>
  --> src/lib.rs:8:26
   |
8  |       pub fn new() -> Self {
   |  __________________________^
9  | |         Self {
10 | |             nxt: None,
11 | |             data: [0; SIZE]
12 | |         }
13 | |     }
   | |_____^
   |
   = note: overflowed on Node<{SIZE * 2}>

error[E0320]: overflow while adding drop-check rules for Node<SIZE>
  --> src/lib.rs:9:9
   |
9  | /         Self {
10 | |             nxt: None,
11 | |             data: [0; SIZE]
12 | |         }
   | |_________^
   |
   = note: overflowed on Node<{SIZE * 2}>

error[E0320]: overflow while adding drop-check rules for std::option::Option<std::boxed::Box<Node<{SIZE * 2}>>>
  --> src/lib.rs:10:18
   |
10 |             nxt: None,
   |                  ^^^^
   |
   = note: overflowed on Node<{SIZE * 2}>

error: aborting due to 3 previous errors

error: could not compile `playground`.

To learn more, run the command again with --verbose.
```

Is this intented to happen?
